display.title: Acquire: ae2:terminal
description: A HID which gives you access to items stored in your ME Network. This will also include items accessible through ME Storage Bus.
It has the ability to sort and search, as well as filter by using View Cell. It requires a channel to function.
Can be upgraded into a ME Crafting Terminal.

subtitle.text: A HID which gives you access to items stored in your ME Network. This will also include items accessible through ME Storage Bus.
